Class DB_API

java.lang.Object
backend.db.DB_API
public class DB_API extends Object
Handles database operations related to competitors and questions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DB_API(String url, String user, String password)
    Constructor that initializes the DB_API object with the provided database connection details.

  • Constructor Details

    • DB_API

      public DB_API(String url, String user, String password)
      Constructor that initializes the DB_API object with the provided database connection details.
      Parameters:
      url - The database URL.
      user - The username for the database.
      password - The password for the database.

  • Method Details

    • clearCompetitorTable

      public void clearCompetitorTable()
      Clears all records from the Competitors table. This method is only intended for testing purposes.

    • updateAdminView

      public void updateAdminView(Competitor comp)
      Updates the competitor's information in the database, including their name, level, age, and scores. If the competitor already exists, their data is updated; otherwise, a new record is inserted.
      Parameters:
      comp - The Competitor object containing the updated information.

    • store

      public void store(Competitor comp)
      Creates or updates the competitor's record in the database. If the competitor already exists, the scores are updated, and if the score is 0, it is replaced with -69.
      Parameters:
      comp - The Competitor object containing the competitor's information.

    • deleteCompetitor

      public void deleteCompetitor(int competitorID)
      Deletes a competitor's record from the database based on the provided competitor ID.
      Parameters:
      competitorID - The ID of the competitor to be deleted.

    • getCompetitorById

      public Competitor getCompetitorById(int competitorID)
      Retrieves a competitor's details from the database using their competitor ID.
      Parameters:
      competitorID - The ID of the competitor to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Competitor object containing the competitor's data, or null if no record is found.

    • getAllCompetitors

      public void getAllCompetitors(CompetitorList competitorList)
      Retrieves all competitors from the database and adds them to the provided CompetitorList.
      Parameters:
      competitorList - The CompetitorList to store all retrieved competitors.
